values: To curve is to move in a line that bends and does not go straight.
The road curves to the left and to the right.

曲线； 曲线图； 弯曲
To curve is to bend or twist something into a curved or rounded shape.
A curve is a line or shape that is not straight but instead has a smooth, rounded shape.
n. 曲线；弯曲；曲线球；曲线图表,adj. 弯曲的；曲线形的,vt. 弯；使弯曲,vi. 成曲形
